text: Peter Howell (1919 - 20 April 2015) was an English actor. He was known for his appearances on Emergency â€“ Ward 10, The Avengers, The Prisoner, Doctor Who, The Lord of the Rings, and Yes Minister. Howell was born in London. He died after a short illness on 20 April 2015 in Northwood, aged 95/96. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1919 births Category:2015 deaths Category:Actors from London Category:Disease-related deaths in England Category:English movie actors Category:English radio actors Category:English television actors
